name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building scalable applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js**, with a strong foundation in **microservices** and **event-driven architectures**. Proficient in developing **RESTful APIs** and implementing **CQRS** and **DDD** methodologies. Demonstrated ability to leverage **asynchronous communication** and **SQL** databases to enhance performance.

Skilled in utilizing **Docker** for containerization and establishing **CI/CD** pipelines for seamless deployment. Proven experience with observability tools like **Prometheus** and **Splunk** for monitoring applications. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to standards in sensitive environments. A comprehensive background in enhancing financial systems and exploring digital assets along with **crypto protocols**. Strong understanding of AI/ML concepts, with hands-on capabilities in deploying cloud-native solutions on AWS and Azure.
